amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 638 related to the repeal of the District of Columbia budget autonomy amendment act of 2012.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 19 printed in House Report 114-639 to strike the repeal of the District of Columbia budget autonomy referendum.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Norton amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 182 - 238 (Roll no. 370).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Norton amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 182 - 238 (Roll no. 370).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A014) offered by Ms. Norton.
